## Course FAQ

::: {style="font-size: 50%;"}
**Q - Is this a data science or a statistics course?**

[A - Whatever you want it be.]{style="color:teal;"}

\

**Q - Is this a coding / computing course?**

[A - Yes, we'll write code to perform the tasks on data analysis projects. We'll spend time on code for data skills that may get tl;dr in other courses.]{style="color:teal;"}

\
**Q - What computing language will we learn?**

[A - R]{style="color:teal;"}

\
**Q - Why not Python, SQL, Julia, and friends?**

[A - Not because we think those tools are bad! We'll master one tool at a time, and learn how to think about problem solving in a tool-independent way.]{style="color:teal;"}

\
**Q - What if I forgot my laptop today? or What if I've never used R before?**

[A - There are laptops in the cart. Please use one today and return it at class end.]{style="color:teal;"}
:::
